name: The Archer (Sebastian Grodziński)
description:
Overview

Play the role of an archer and practice your precision. Beat your records under time pressure.

Controls

Move - A and D or Left and Right Arrows

Shot - Mouse

Features
  • Game lasts 30 seconds
  • Three different targets, each with a different range
  • Shooting at different targets gives you a different number of points
  • The shot in the center of the target is scored specially
